fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e3.equipments.heater

Class ThermostatedHeater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e3.equipments.heater.ThermostatedHeater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, HeaterImplementationI, ControlledHeaterImplementationI

    public class ThermostatedHeater
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements ControlledHeaterImplementationI
    The class ThermostatedHeater a thermostated heater component.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       targetTemperature >= -50.0 && targetTemperature <= 50.0
 invariant       accFactor > 0.0
 invariant       !isUnderTest || clockURI != null && !clockURI.isEmpty()
 invariant       !isSimulated || simArchitectureURI != null && !simArchitectureURI.isEmpty()

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       SENSOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !SENSOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       ACTUATOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !ACTUATOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       STANDARD_TARGET_TEMPERATURE >= -50.0 && STANDARD_TARGET_TEMPERATURE <= 50.0

    Created on : 2021-09-10

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  ThermostatedHeater.HeaterState
      The enumeration HeaterState describes the operation states of the heater.
      static class  ThermostatedHeater.SensorData
      The abstract class SensorData implements the common variables and methods for the data objects that are exchanged between this component and the controller component.
      static class  ThermostatedHeater.StateData
      The class StateData represents the state data that are exchanged between this component and the controller component.
      static class  ThermostatedHeater.TemperatureData
      The class TemperatureData represents the temperature data that are exchanged between this component and the controller component.

      unless explicitly specified, track this target temperature.

      target temperature for the heating.
      static int VERBOSE
      when 0, no trace is produced, when 1 methods making state changes trace their actions and when 2 getter methods also trace their actions.

      • ThermostatedHeater

        protected ThermostatedHeater(boolean isUnderTest,
                             boolean isUnitTest,
                             boolean isSimulated,
                             java.lang.String simArchitectureURI,
                             double accFactor,
                             java.lang.String clockURI)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        create a new thermostated heater.

        Contract

         pre     INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 pre     SENSOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !SENSOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 pre     ACTUATOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !ACTUATOR_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 pre     !isSimulated || simArchitectureURI != null && !simArchitectureURI.isEmpty()
 pre     accFactor > 0.0
 pre     !isUnderTest || clockURI != null && !clockURI.isEmpty()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        isUnderTest - when true, the simulated test run is test mode.
        isUnitTest - when true, the simulated test run is unit test mode, otherwise it is an integration test.
        isSimulated - when true, the component performs a SIL simulation in a test run.
        simArchitectureURI - URI of the simulation architecture to be created or the empty string if the component does not execute as a SIL simulation.
        accFactor - acceleration factor used in timing actions.
        clockURI - URI of the clock to be used to synchronise the test scenarios and the simulation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
